ygData.subject: Re: A time for opinions
ygData.msgSnippet: ...  ... Not at all. As long as you do not rip people off, and deal fair then it is fine. ... Nope. I did the sam thing in the first couple months of
ygData.messageBody:
>From: rdparker@...
<SNIP>
>My questions are these:
>
>* Is what I am doing wrong?
Not at all. As long as you do not rip people off, and deal fair then it is
fine.

>
>* Is it outside the spirit of the game?
Nope. I did the sam thing in the first couple months of release. I was
making plat like crazy doing the Kelethin to Qeynos trade run at 6th level
(on a one week old server this is a VERY scary trip). I could easly make
100 plat every 2 nights at 6th level :) I used this money to finance the
smith in my guild, looking back I should have done the smithing as the
person deleted the character later on, grrrrrrr.

>
>* What, if anything, can I do to dispell the illusion that I am a twink?
This will be hard to do, especially on a established server.

>
>* Buying lambent armour is I feel in-character for this character. And, I
> never thought twice about it until I was reading some recent posts. Will
>I
> be hated for it? Is it wrong? Is it simply jealousy?
If you get Lambent too early you will be wearing the same armor for a
loooooong time. It is really up to you.

>
>--
>Galeras (Any suggestions?)
>Bard of the 8th song
>E'ci

Rokenn Swiftsong - Karana server
Retired Merchant Bard

EQ Bard Song Analysis
http://rgonzalez.net/EQSongs/
